page.title: 14TUXFORD problems 2
page.content:
are where motor bikes go. One Thursday there was a crash involving a car and a motor bike that just shows how bad motor bikes can be.
{TUXFORD PROBLEMS LITTER
I think that Tuxford has a lot of litter but I know that there is a man who cleans the roads and trys to make it tidy but I think there should be someone to help him. Sometimes when we get new litter bins vandals smash them up soon there aren't many litter bins about.
{MOTOR BIKES
Some motor bikes are a lot louder than others because some people take the baffles out of the exhaust which makes them sound lounder. Sometimes they go
